message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  $90 is a bit more than I'm looking to spend.  I'm willing to pay $85 for it.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking to save a bit, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $87.50
